seller-sku.description: Unique SKU assigned by the seller for the product

fulfillment-channel-sku.description: Unique SKU assigned by the seller for fulfillment

asin.description: Unique Amazon Standard Identification Number assigned to the product

condition-type.description: Type of condition (new, used, refurbished, etc.) of the product

country.description: Country code identifying the country the inventory data pertains to

quantity-for-local-fulfillment.description: Quantity of the product available for local fulfillment

dataEndTime.description: Timestamp indicating when the data was last updated
